contextId.occurrenceNote: Even though the author uses the plural pronoun "we," he is most likely referring only to himself. Alternate translation: "I have much to say" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-pronouns]])
contextId.quote: πολὺς ἡμῖν ὁ ὁ λόγος λόγος
